source:
TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Ghin Gin's son could use a helping hand, wherever he is.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
モルド・スークのギーンギンは、大事な息子を心配しているようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_TODO_00<tab>Scatter wriggler powder at the designated location northeast of Mord Souq.
target: TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_TODO_00<tab>モルド・スーク北東の印の上で<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EBE01 /var>を使う

source: TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_TODO_01<tab>Scatter wriggler powder at the designated location near the Red Serai.
target: TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_TODO_01<tab>隊商の野営地近くの印の上で<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EBE01 /var>を使う

source: TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_TODO_02<tab>Deliver Ghin Gin's letter to Thaymoth.

target:
TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_GHINGIN_000_001<tab>ハァ～、まったくもう、
ワタシの方が緊張しちゃうネ～……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_GHINGIN_000_002<tab>Who, you ask? It's my little one. He has gone on his first errand to the Red Serai and I am worried sick about him!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_GHINGIN_000_002<tab>ワタシの息子を、今度初めて「隊商の野営地」まで、
ひとりで商品を運びに行かせるネ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_GHINGIN_000_003<tab>Anything could have happened! It is hot and dry and there are gigantenders that might try to squish him! I must do what I can to see he arrives safely, but he would be so embarrassed if he knew I had been helping.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_GHINGIN_000_003<tab>もし道に迷って、干からびた姿で発見されたらと思うと……
パパ、心配で心配で、たまらないネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_GHINGIN_000_004<tab>Maybe you could do it? Yes, that would work. Do you know the long bridge? Northeast from here, it is.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_GHINGIN_000_004<tab>アンタ、野営地からきたネ？
野営地までまっすぐ行く途中、吊り橋を渡る前と後に、
岩があるの知ってるはずヨ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_GHINGIN_000_005<tab>Take this wriggler powder and scatter it on the big rock on this side of the ravine. And maybe a bit more, further up the road.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_GHINGIN_000_005<tab>そこに、この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EBE01 /var>」をまいてきてほしいネ！
この粉、息子が大好きな白ミミズを、
乾燥させて粉末にしたものヨ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_GHINGIN_000_006<tab>Why, you ask? Simple. We Mord use aromas like this to wake us up when we are sleepy or tired. Once my son smells this, he will have no trouble reaching the Red Serai!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_GHINGIN_000_006<tab>モルド族は鼻が敏感だから、この匂いに引き寄せられて、
息子も迷わず「隊商の野営地」まで着ける～って寸法ネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_GHINGIN_000_007<tab>Oh, and could you give this letter to Thaymoth?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_GHINGIN_000_007<tab>それからこの「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EBF01 /var>」を、
野営地の「セイモス」に渡してほしいネ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_GHINGIN_000_008<tab>I know it is a lot to ask, but if anything were to happen to my son, I would never forgive myself!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_GHINGIN_000_008<tab>ワタシが行くと息子に勘づかれてしまうかもしれないネ……。
だからヨロシク頼むヨ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_GHINGIN_000_010<tab>The powder is made from sand wrigglers, my son's favorite dish. Even the smell puts a spring in his step!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_GHINGIN_000_010<tab>まずは吊り橋を渡る前と後にある岩に、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EBE01 /var>」をまいてほしいネ。
息子のために、よろしく頼むヨ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_SYSTEM_100_010<tab>It seems this is not the ideal place to scatter wriggler powder.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_SYSTEM_100_010<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EBE01 /var>」をまくのは、
この場所ではなさそうだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_GHINGIN_000_020<tab>You found the big rock, yes? And scattered the powder? Thank you! Oh, you did not forget to deliver the letter to Thaymoth, did you?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_GHINGIN_000_020<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EBE01 /var>」はまき終わったネ？
なら次は、「セイモス」に、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EBF01 /var>」を渡してネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_THAYMOTH_000_031<tab>From Ghin Gin, eh? Something something...my boy, something something hard worker... Gods, this handwriting is abysmal, but I think I get the gist of it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_THAYMOTH_000_031<tab>モルド・スークから手紙か……なるほど。
息子のことをヨロシクヨロシクと、そればかり書いてあるようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_THAYMOTH_000_032<tab>It seems like he's gone out of his way to help his son, though it's probably a bit unnecessary. From what I've seen, he's quite capable of taking care of himself without being mollycoddled.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_THAYMOTH_000_032<tab>道しるべに私への口利きにとずいぶん手厚いが、
どうあっても息子の初仕事を成功させたいらしいな。
モルド族にも、やたらに過保護な親バカがいたものだな！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_THAYMOTH_000_033<tab>Having said that, it's hard not to be moved by this gesture of his. I know that family means a lot to the Mord, more than we give them credit for sometimes. I'll see his son gets fair treatment, don't you worry.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_THAYMOTH_000_033<tab>しかし、人を寄こしてまで丁寧に頼まれては無下にできん。
息子とやらが来たら、丁重に迎えてやることにしよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_THAYMOTH_000_034<tab>And it only seems right that you be rewarded for your hard work in maintaining relations between us and the Mord. Here, this is for you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA021_03363_THAYMOTH_000_034<tab>あんたへの報酬も同封してあったぞ。
これを取っておけ、ご苦労だったな。
